title: Aroma Worshippers Landing Page
description: Official website for Aroma Worshippers Music Ministry. Built with modern frontend tools to provide a clean, responsive, and user-friendly experience.
longDescription: A fully responsive landing page for Aroma Worshippers Music Ministry featuring modern design principles, smooth animations, and optimized performance for the best user experience.

title: Quizard
description: A frontend quiz app built with React + Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase authentication for testing students.
longDescription: Interactive quiz application with user authentication, multiple question types, scoring system, and real-time results. Built to create and manage quizzes for educational purposes.

title: Haven
description: A modern e-commerce furniture store built with React, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion animations.
longDescription: Full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, filtering system, and glassmorphism design. Features smooth animations and mobile-responsive UI.

title: To-do App
description: A simple Todo List application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and Tailwind CSS.
longDescription: Minimalist todo application with task management, filtering options, and persistent storage. Demonstrates clean state management with Redux Toolkit.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard built with React, Redux Toolkit, and Axios for real-time weather data.
longDescription: Interactive weather application that fetches real-time data from OpenWeather API. Features city search, detailed forecasts, and responsive design with clean UI.

title: Aurora
description: A sleek, modern landing page for a fictional SaaS platform with smooth animations and responsive design.
longDescription: Polished landing page featuring smooth scrolling, micro-interactions, and modern design patterns. Built with React, Vite, and Framer Motion for exceptional user experience.

title: Pathfinder
description: A React travel inspiration platform combining multiple APIs for comprehensive travel information.
longDescription: Advanced travel platform integrating Unsplash, OpenTripMap, Rest Countries, and OpenWeather APIs. Features destination discovery, weather information, and stunning photography with sophisticated state management.

title: Lexicon
description: A dictionary app built as a frontend final project using React and Free Dictionary API.
longDescription: Comprehensive dictionary application with word definitions, pronunciations, and usage examples. Built as a demonstration of API integration and clean React architecture.
